mapper.sql: ID, CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_PERSON, ACCEPT_PERSON, STATUS
mapper.delete: delete from tf_message_board where STATUS = 'E' AND ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into tf_message_board
ID,
CONTENT,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATE_PERSON,
ACCEPT_PERSON,
STATUS,

mapper.update:
update tf_message_board
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCEPT_PERSON = #{acceptPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tf_message_board set CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACCEPT_PERSON = #{acceptPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from tf_message_board where STATUS = 'E' AND ACCEPT_PERSON = #{acceptPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by CREATE_TIME desc
